title: Dagmous7
author: Dagmous7
content: I repeat @thewildKing/ https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3507964 and @Makisha99/ https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3406174post1. Post link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5457275.msg62458424#msg624584242. Post link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5457428.msg62454545#msg62454545@TheWildKing post Assan Verse fourth round bounty payment not paying properly or bounty managers.They run the bounty for 16 weeks.After 16 weeks of work, it was found that most of the participants' addresses did not match their main addresses.Even Instagram username, Telegram username and Facebook username are not matching.In the final speedsheet they put their desired wallet address.As a result, many bounty hunters are deprived of the payment they receive even after working.https://t.me/Jamescarlos_zAndhttps://t.me/CryptoworldmanIf you message them, they don't see it and even after seeing it, they don't reply.Bounty link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5441648.0I am showing you the spreadsheet of ASAN VERS round 4 Bounty.https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1P55K6hTjnfwX9Z1GpzR9SagE-AjhRC6fkNN1PY8uXbI/edit?usp=drivesdkThey have locked the spreadsheet right now.I am a new and newbie member but I don't get paid to work on their campaigns.So I am reporting this to you and request you to take action against them so that no future bounty hunters are deprived of their payment.Thanks Everyone üôèüôè@Makisha99 postBounty link:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5441648.0Payments cheating: CWM all management team payments cheating with to maximum bounty hunters.CWM team has changed my wallet address and taken my rewards.I worked for 16 long weeks but didn't get paid. The initial spreadsheet had kept the name, but the final spreadsheet with no name. 90% tokens are killed by CWM management.The final spreadsheet has been checked from one to ten. One wallet address does not match the bounty authentication link.Final spreadsheet pictures first page link:http://ibn.im/MmEl4utTelegram username: https://t.me/Jamescarlos_zCrypto world channel link:https://t.me/cryptoworld_managmentCWM Founder:https://t.me/cryptoworldmanagmentBitcointalk Profile Link:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3479982https://twitter.com/AsanVerseSee the many complaint Asanverse Telegram groups:https://t.me/ASANTokenAsanverse - 4 round final spreadsheet link:https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1swVEkmEgU5GAebN_odNUSthoEywz9iro4To0RXVaPEQ/edit?usp=sharingMy personal information:Actual Tw Spreadsheet pictures link:http://ibn.im/mfV1HZAActual complaint Tw spreadsheet pictures link:http://ibn.im/RB4AiIFAfter changed wallet address:Present Tw Spreadsheet pictures link:http://ibn.im/tJyKHXjPresent Final Spreadsheet pictures:http://ibn.im/25VPHZCCoinmarketcap voted link:http://ibn.im/GavFT2ZChanged spreadsheet wallet:Final spreadsheet no: 142Twitter new spreadsheet:94Previous spreadsheet walletTwitter ¬†spreadsheet No:90Please verify it and ¬†take proper step as soon as possible. Maybe many bounty hunters has lost, because payment cheating.ThanksI request DT members and senior brothers of this forum to look into this a bit.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.created_time: June 26, 2023, 12:41:13 PMLast edit: June 26, 2023, 12:58:01 PM by Cantsay
comments.body: You could have added your post to those other accusation thread altough I do get the fact that you want yours to be visible as ¬†it can easily ignored by others who normally don't read the complete post in a thread before replying.Like I said in the previous the forum does not moderate scams and your post is not that clear for forum members to make sense of, because according to the thread title it says "paid' and yet they proceeded to locking the spreadsheet so others can't access which to me seems like a shady move, If indeed they were legit and did the distribution properly they won't have lock the spreadsheet.I can see that some bounty hunters have pulled out their alt accounts to tag the campaign manager already, but the question is; if DT members should tag the CM and he launches another campaign are bounty hunters not going to participate in the new campaign?

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.created_time: June 26, 2023, 12:51:16 PMLast edit: June 26, 2023, 01:05:58 PM by lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: The third topic is about one bounty company; isn't there too much honor given to another scam?When will bounty hunters finally begin to understand that participation in such programs is tantamount to playing roulette? At least choose experienced managers, and don't go everywhere as soon as you are promised unrealistic payments.The forum does not moderate scams. I agree with Cantsay. How long will you be upset if tomorrow you are offered to participate in the next bounty?And please don't call bounties a job.Grow up.Quote from: Cryptoworldman on June 05, 2022, 12:12:04 PMSeniors, please answer my questions The number one question is how do I know if a project is good or bad?The second question is how to verify which project can pay and which can cheat it willDoes this tell you anything about your manager's experience?Pay attention, exactly 15 days later, he apparently learned to distinguish between black and white and decided to become a manager.

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: So in short you're complaining if the bounty management added many unknown participants on the bounty you've joined?You need to give a proof of the bounty manager added unknown participants which the twitter, instagram accounts etc can't be found. You're only show your name were on 94th and the new spreadsheet, you name are on 142th. I don't really know why the management added more participants because they've not answered yet, but their accounts are newbie rank and they can easily create new accounts without lose anything.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: Dagmous7 on June 26, 2023, 11:43:43 AMI request DT members and senior brothers of this forum to look into this a bit.Son, Bounty is a field of trouble, scams, stupid managers, cheats, Alt accounts, it's all there, ok, once we tagged the manager, can you guarantee that in the future cases like this will not happen again, is there a guarantee for other members who don't complain about paying tokens here, so you have to really put that under your hair to participate in the Bounty, you have a myriad of risks if you promote bounty projects that are not yet clear.Note: in the Bounty section there are still managers you can trust about pay, such as: @irfan_pak10, @CryptopreneurBrainboss, @sujonali1819, @julerz12, and some others who are highly rated running Bounty campaigns, at least they have Escrow to run the Bounty, for the security of participant token payments, consider only their Bounties for the future so you don't have problems with payments.

comments.author: Ariful07
comments.body: I have requested Forum ¬†higher person. Please check the First 1 to 10 wallet address finding the Bounty link.Then seen the actual proof.Bounty link:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5441648.0The CWM team has changed the wallet address ¬†and used her wallet address. All teams are cheating with bounty hunters.CWM teams wallet address:1.0xE66F6816367111A2a7918add09b3152e3aE4AfBa2.0xa004e40a9FC573Eb09166Fa1CD02cc66a3c219fe3.0x3c7CF448E6a67D42ea9eFAE2D1C8F046897314474.0xa5625D88563Ac90916Cc9F6703ffe2aF91A3C8275.0x39abddBDfb087e0057029bEE32632ef54768663C6.0x9936D3653EcF441009B890d298ABa61b82DFaF247.0xE0D415D053B1A904Eaa6bC936D171D73ac6E7f888.0xa07Ff034F6Ac4B8585F3399b45Ca8Cd71abd6C699.0x9c61afDE61b89d698feA9F60e41c63732Cc9143910.0x2c66F6bfbd3E48dED0Ccbea2d493fD530FEdf66cAsanVerse-4 round final spreadsheet pictures link:http://ibn.im/6lOHFjVPlease see the Asanverse agency and CWM manager Telegram discussion link:1.http://ibn.im/9eJGIcL2.http://ibn.im/R4JnrS4Asanverse Telegramhttps://t.me/ASANTokenTill now, ¬†the spreadsheet is locked. Please check it and take arrangements¬†as per forum policy.Thanks

comments.author: Helena Yu
comments.body: Quote from: Ariful07 on June 26, 2023, 02:59:00 PMIs this your alt account @OP? you both have similarity of the way you post and using same third party hosting service e.g. ImageBan. @Ariful07 received few negative feedbacks due to cheating in bounties, now you want to report the campaign manager for cheating.How you can convince people to believe your words when you're also a cheater in the first place?

comments.author: Pandu Geddon
comments.body: OP, and anyone else protesting this bounty issue. it sounds unfair to those of you who think bounties are jobs. but the best solution is to ignore the bounty manager like that. he is unprofessional, and a bounty participant without knowing his track record blindly registers in the bounty campaign.if no one registers in the bounty campaign he holds then all will be over. but in my opinion, after you guys got scammed, and the bounty manager posted another bounty campaign thread, you guys still signed up again, then it's very likely that you guys will be stuck in the same hole again.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Dagmous7 on June 26, 2023, 11:43:43 AMI am a new and newbie member but I don't get paid to work on their campaigns.So I am reporting this to you and request you to take action against them so that no future bounty hunters are deprived of their payment.The most effective action that can be taken against such managers and campaigns is for you bounty hunters to stop participating in them and to ignore them completely. In this way, you only give them the appearance of legality and justification for some money that they will receive from the project owner. If the project is sustainable at all, and there is a very small percentage of such.QuoteI request DT members and senior brothers of this forum to look into this a bit.The maximum that DT members can do is to mark that manager with red feedback. But do you bounty hunters go to follow that feedback and ignore such a manager, or do you prefer to ignore it and continue to participate in his campaigns?

comments.author: nutildah
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on June 26, 2023, 04:27:13 PMThe maximum that DT members can do is to mark that manager with red feedback.I took it a step farther and reported some of his early posts for plagiarism so he's now banned.¬† Not sure how that helps anybody, but its been done.I read through a chat on the ASAN VERSE Telegram channel and regardless of opinions about the project or bounty hunters in general, it would appear this Cryptoworldman person is a real scumbag. I'm pretty sure they've pulled similar scams in the past under different names. I don't know how they get anybody to trust them.Taking it two steps farther, I linked them to a bunch of other accounts using the address in this now-deleted post:
